JOB DESCRIPTION: You will develop software to meet our client's user needs using C#/.Net, follow best practice guidelines and help to improve those guidelines. You will be creating best in class documentation with our client users in mind. This is an opportunity to join one of the biggest Microsoft Digital Transformation Projects in Northern Ireland and join our growing Digital and Cloud Practice in Belfast.   Qualifications   Essential criteria:    Current .Net / C# Development experience     DevOps experience including CI/CD pipelines      ASP.Net MVC experience      SAML and WebForms experience      Current .Net Developer experience     Experience of working as part of a Scrum Team     Desire to learn new skills
